SEARCH

Package shapes

package shapes
The shapes package defines various geometric shapes such as cylinders, cones, and pyramids.

Each shape implements the abstract Shape class, which provides methods to calculate height, base area, and volume.

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Cone
    The Cone class represents a three-dimensional geometric shape that extends the abstract Shape class.
    Cylinder
    The Cylinder class models a 3D shape with two parallel circular bases connected by a curved surface.
    OctagonalPrism
    The OctagonalPrism class represents a prism with an octagonal base.
    PentagonalPrism
    The PentagonalPrism class models a prism with a pentagonal base.
    Prism
    The Prism class serves as an abstract base for all prism-like shapes.
    Pyramid
    The Pyramid class represents a square-based pyramid, a 3D shape with a square base and four triangular faces converging to a single apex.
    Shape
    The Shape class is an abstract base class that defines a generic 3D shape characterized by its height.
    SquarePrism
    The SquarePrism class represents a three-dimensional prism with a square base.
    TriangularPrism
    The TriangularPrism class models a prism with an equilateral triangular base.
